content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia Müller, it's nice to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I'm sure you know that the rental price is an important aspect of the lease agreement. I would like to discuss the rental price with you in detail, so let's start by saying what price range you are looking for. Do you have a specific budget in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 400 Euros per month. I am willing to negotiate the price with you.

I am dependable and responsible, I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment.

I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your willingness to be a responsible tenant. Based on the 25 square meter size of the apartment and your budget of 400 Euros per month, I believe that 350 Euros per month is a fair rental price. I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month. Let's move forward with the lease agreement and sign the contract.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for agreeing to the rental price. I will sign the contract and pay the first month's rent of 350 Euros at the end of this week.

I will make sure to keep the apartment in good condition and pay my rent on time.

Thank you again for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for signing the contract and paying the first month's rent, Emilia. I appreciate your promptness and commitment to being a responsible tenant. I am confident that you will keep the apartment in good condition and pay your rent on time. I wish you all the best in your new home. Thank you again for your cooperation and best regards.
name: Heinrich Heine
